sections.paragraph: + Reubenite spy, son of Zaccur. (Numbers 13:4) (B.C. 1490.) + Son of David, by his wife Bathsheba. (1 Chronicles 14:4) (B.C. 1045.) + A Levite, the father of Abda. (Nehemiah 11:17) The same as [1079]Shemaiah, 6. + The representative of the priestly family of Bilgah or Bilgai, in the days of Joiakim. (Nehemiah 12:18) (B.C. about 500.)
